tasks.label: Ejecutar Backend (FastAPI)
args: $ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; if (Test-Path .venv) { $env:Path="$PWD\.venv\Scripts;$env:Path" }; python -m pip install --upgrade pip; python -m pip install -r backend/requirements.txt; python -m uvicorn backend.app.main:app --reload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000
